alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 2:47PM EDT until May 16 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clinton County in northern New York... Northeastern Franklin County in northern New York... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 247 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bryants Mill, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Churubusco, Merrill, Bryants Mill, Chateaugay, Lyon Mountain, Ellenburg Depot, Ellenburg, Earlville, Harrigan, Ellenburg Center, Owls Head, Chasm Falls, Standish, Brainardsville and Wolf Pond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
